extendedInfo.description: Looking for a new recipe? Have a special diet or nutrition needs? Our Recipes and Nutrition app is your solution. It is both an amazing recipe finder and the only place where you can compare and select over a million recipes from hundreds of web-sites for calorie, diet and nutrition information.Weâve prepped the ingredients. You make the cooking. Here is a step by step of how it works:1.	You type in your search. Maybe youâve seen a new inspiring vegetable at the grocery store; or feel like baking vegan and gluten-free cookies. Or maybe, you want to get creative in the kitchen and find a new great recipe for high protein, low calorie meal. Whatever the case, we have the answer.2.	Select a filter. We handle all the major nutrition and calorie needs. Make your selection before you hit search or after you find some recipes. Itâs up to you. Here are some of our most popular filters.â	Vegetarianâ	Veganâ	High Proteinâ	Gluten Freeâ	Dairy Freeâ	Low Carbâ	Low Fatâ	Recipes Between 200 and 400 Calories3.	We deliver the results. Our algorithm brings up on top the highest quality recipes from the top web-sites such as Epicurious, Food & Wine, 101 Cookbooks, Simply Recipes and many more. No need to browse back and forth. Weâve done the work of bringing up the best and highest quality.4.	See and compare. Weâve made it super easy to browse through the results. All recipes have great photos and you can quickly go through the top results and compare for nutrition and ingredients. Each recipe has a full nutritional profile, so you can see not only the calorie, protein, fat and carb content, but also the values and recommended daily intake for many essential micro nutrients and minerals. Thatâs why we call it Recipes and Nutrition app!5.	Go shopping. Each recipe has a list of ingredients with easy checkboxes for convenient grocery shopping. You donât even need to write down a grocery list. Just bring your phone or tablet to the store, find the recipe you want and shop for it using our app. The time you save on planning and shopping, you can spend making delicious and nutritious meals in the kitchen.Enjoy!Yours in the kitchen,The Edamam Team

reviews.title: Only ok
reviews.comment: I downloaded this as it mentioned that you can filter by dietary requirements and I wanted an easy way to find dairy free recipes.  Chose the dairy free option and has goats cheese in the first few recipes. I am not a big fan of mayo and it has mayo in most recipes. Pity you can\'t enter a word to filter out.
reviews.author: Maeve Rohan

reviews.title: ++++A Super Easy to Use
reviews.comment: AWESOME APP!!!
reviews.author: Kharyna Rome

reviews.title: Awesome and simple
reviews.comment: Simple, easy-to-use features along with amazing recipes. No promenade on my Samsung Galaxy Note 2.
reviews.author: Nekyta Riely

reviews.title: Mmmmm
reviews.comment: Love this app. I\'ve used it many times already. I definitely recommend it. Delicious
reviews.author: James Daily

reviews.title: Needs recipe-saving option
reviews.comment: This app makes nutrition-conscious recipe searching easy and pleasant. Love the streamlined design. However, it\'s useless to me without a way to save recipes! If this feature were added, I would give a full rating.
reviews.author: Julia Robeck

reviews.title: I Love this app!!
reviews.comment: I think this is the best recipe app out there. There are no limits to what you can make. I appreciate the fact that they are diet conscious as well. I have lost 65 pounds with the help of Edamam!!
reviews.author: Sasha Naborne

reviews.title: Brilliant -10 stars
reviews.comment: I would have bought a smartphone just for this. As a fussy healthy eater at last I can quickly find yummy recipes to suit my taste and diet.
reviews.author: S Harris

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is great for getting quick recipes. I could definitely see myself using this.
reviews.author: chris Whinery

reviews.comment: This is BY FAR THE BEST recipe app. It not only has the recipes it also has nutrition info and everything! ! Wow thank u to the developers of this app!!!
reviews.author: sally lindquist

reviews.title: Cool ap but...
reviews.comment: Cool ap but completely useless without save feature
reviews.author: JAN BROWN

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: This app makes it super easy to find new recipes you haven\'t tried before. I recommend this to anyone who is tired of the same old recipes and ready to try something new!
reviews.author: Sandra Brown

reviews.title: Awesome recipes with this app
reviews.comment: I have tried 3 recipes with this app...they were all awesome! Very easy to usr
reviews.author: James Davis

reviews.title: I love to cook
reviews.comment: Thank u
reviews.author: Alison Cabrera

reviews.title: Convenient
reviews.comment: I like how u get many reciepes at the touch of a button. Super easy to use.
reviews.author: LUNA LORE

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: I like this app. Gives you also the caloric value. Very useful.
reviews.author: Kavi Ujoodha

reviews.title: Has a lot of potential
reviews.comment: Love it, except saving recipes is essential! please make it so that you can save your fav\'s! Otherwise a great app...
reviews.author: Courtney v

reviews.title: Nice.
reviews.comment: Haven\'t used it to its full yet,  but helpful so far!
reviews.author: Shannon Moyle

reviews.title: Delicious Recipes
reviews.comment: I give this app 4 stars would be 5 stars if there was a way I could save my favorite recipes within the app.
reviews.author: Creshonda Washington

reviews.title: One stop shop
reviews.comment: One stop shop app....recipes and debit info.
reviews.author: Mitchell Miller

reviews.title: Great stuff here!
reviews.comment: I love the recipes given by this app. They are wonderful and healthy!
reviews.author: Chenoa Arico
